english.segment1: Find me a place on the earth. Where a weary man can rest. And listen for your voice. In the turning seasons
english.segment2: A quiet place in the world. Where I can bow. And confess that I fear. Where you have brought me, Mysterious God
english.segment3: All of my life. You have been with me. My comfort in loneliness. My hope in the dark. All of my life. Lord, please stay with me. Be my sustaining breath. Guardian of my heart
english.segment4: My days are passing by. Like falling stars. That blaze across the night sky. Then they are gone
english.segment5: But Father, at your side. I will never be afraid. For you have held all my days. In the palm of your hand
